casebody.data:
NEW JERSEY DIVISION OF CHILD PROTECTION AND PERMANENCY, Plaintiff-Movant,
v.
R.L.M., Defendant,
and
J.J., Defendant-Respondent. In the Matter of the Guardianship of R.A.J., a Minor. M-1249 September Term 2017
079473 Supreme Court of New Jersey. June 01, 2018

ORDER

It is ORDERED that the motion to expand the record is granted.
